description: Joined a great team at Clinikally, contributing to high-performance healthcare technology and building impactful user experiences.

Built a performance-focused analytics dashboard using Next.js, optimizing the rendering of large datasets. Integrated AI capabilities (Voice, Text) via WebSockets/REST APIs and enhanced interactivity using Framer Motion.

Developed scalable, modular UI components for critical banking workflows using React and TypeScript. Engineered robust data integration layers and enforced strict type safety to reduce runtime errors.
